The Arlésienne (Madame Ginoux), 1888. Oil on canvas.
91.4 x 73.7 cm
The Metropolitan Museum of Art, Bequest of Sam A. Lewisohn, 1951 (51.112.3). Photograph by Malcom Varon ©1979 The Metropolitan Museum of Art
